title: India, Russia, China Ahead In Hypersonic Tech, US No Longer Dominates: Top Senator - NDTV
content: India, Russia, China Ahead In Hypersonic Tech, US No Longer Dominates: Top Senator  NDTV
description: The US is no longer dominating several advanced technologies, an influential American Senator in Washington has observed, saying that India, Russia, and China have advantages on hypersonic technology.
